thread.title: Lisa Appleton shows off her tanlines as she strips off for a shower following Mexican holiday
thread.title_full: Lisa Appleton shows off her tanlines as she strips off for a shower following Mexican holiday

author: JJ Nattrass
title: Lisa Appleton shows off her tanlines as she strips off for a shower following Mexican holiday
text:
Showbiz Lisa Appleton shows off her tanlines as she strips off for a shower following Mexican holiday The former Big Brother star, 48, flaunted her tanned and curvaceous form as she arrived back in the UK Share Lisa Appleton (Photo: James Curley) Share   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The former Big Brother star has been sunning herself poolside in Mexico on a winter getaway. 
And as Lisa Appleton touched down back home in the UK she wasn't shy about showing off her new golden tan, stripping off for a shower as soon as she got to her airport hotel. 
The former Big Brother star - who shot to fame in 2008 - certainly seemed to have committed to getting a golden glow, as there was only one noticeable tan line on her figure. Lisa Appleton (Photo: JAMES CURLEY) 
. 
Clearly in need of a freshen up after her transatlantic jaunt Lisa wasted no time in hitting the shower. 
Stripping off, the Warrington native showed off her figure as she headed for a the shower in an airport hotel room - with a photographer in tow. 
Proudly flaunting her curvy form, the Big Brother nine - who is no stranger to putting on a racy display - went to 'freshen up'. Lisa Appleton (Photo: JAMES CURLEY) 
Protecting her modesty with only her arm and a tiny white flannel, Lisa proudly displayed the tan line from her bikini bottoms. 
Having preserved her modesty whilst out in the Mexican sun, the provocative poser nearly dare to bare all. 
Lisa looked to be in a rush to get showered as she hadn't even spared the time to take her make-up off, heading into the cubicle with a full layering of beauty products on. Lisa Appleton (Photo: JAMES CURLEY) 
Her impromptu posing in the bathroom comes after she fled the dreary winter weather and headed to Mexico for a spot of R&R. 
The former Big Brother flop - who was famous for getting engaged to boyfriend Mario Marconi - enjoyed a few days away poolside, sipping beers and topping up her tan. 
Lisa has seen her star rise in stock over the past few months as her eye-grabbing antics have seen her propelled back into the limelight; from feeding her toyboy food on the beach to her regular trips out in saucy outfits. Like us on Facebook
